# Revolutionary Spring

Revolutionary Spring: Fighting for a New World 1848–1849 is a book written by Christopher Clark and published by the Crown Books division of Penguin Random House in 2023. It explores the history of the European revolutions of 1848.
Structure
Work begins with an introduction by the author and is followed by nine chapters and a conclusion plus appendices and indexes.
# Introduction
# Social Questions
# Conjecture of Order
# Confrontation
# Detonations
# Regime Change

# Entropy

# After 1848
# Conclusion
